name: BibleVerses
0:
”Alexa, open bible verses”
”Alexa, start bible verses”
”Alexa, launch bible verses”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bible verses
des:
Ask for Bible verses and hear messages of faith and hope.

To get started, just say "Alexa, start Bible verses" or "Alexa, open Bible verses" to get a Bible message.

At any time, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
